Line1.B2A6F: As I'm sure you know, even seemingly mundane objects sometimes contain great power. I can help you wrest that power free!
Line3.B2A6F: The process will break down the original object, leaving behind the pure aspect of its mystical power.
Line5.B2A6F: You might think of it as ripping the soul from one body and transferring it to another. Not that I would ever dream of such as thing - certainly not within earshot of the Cathedral...
